query:
-- تحديث الإحداثيات للحاويات بناءً على حالتها ومواقعها الفعلية
UPDATE containers SET 
  currentLatitude = 25.2744, 
  currentLongitude = 55.2962 
WHERE containerNumber = 'MAEU1234567';

UPDATE containers SET 
  currentLatitude = 29.5266, 
  currentLongitude = 35.0078 
WHERE containerNumber = 'MSCU7654321';

UPDATE containers SET 
  currentLatitude = 31.9539, 
  currentLongitude = 35.9106 
WHERE containerNumber = 'CMAU9876543';

UPDATE containers SET 
  currentLatitude = 12.8797, 
  currentLongitude = 45.0345 
WHERE containerNumber = 'HLCU5432109';

UPDATE containers SET 
  currentLatitude = 21.4858, 
  currentLongitude = 39.1925 
WHERE containerNumber = 'OOLU8765432';

UPDATE containers SET 
  currentLatitude = 35.5138, 
  currentLongitude = 24.0180 
WHERE containerNumber = 'EGLV3210987';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user QB2fahn7CwkdyG9.root --database 5j9uG3pftfjEb3akdTmTAd --execute
